text: The Golden Palace is an American sitcom. It is a spin-off of the sitcom The Golden Girls. It was shot from 1992-1993. They have as help the receptionist Roland Wilson (Don Cheadle) and the cook Chuy Castillos (Cheech Marin). Sometimes the young Oliver (Billy L. Sullivan) appears. ==Characters== * Rose Nylund (Betty White) * Blanche Devereaux (Rue McClanahan) * Sophia Petrillo Weinstock (Estelle Getty) * Roland Wilson (Don Cheadle) is the hotel manager. * Chuy Castillos (Cheech Marin) is the cook. * Oliver Webb (Billy L. Sullivan) ==Background== * Bea Arthur didn't play in this series. * It was shot only 24 episodes. Many people said that without Bea Arthur, the series would be unsuccessful. Category:1990s American sitcoms Category:CBS network shows Category:1992 American television series debuts Category:Television spin-offs Category:1993 American television series endings Category:English-language television programs
title: The Golden Palace
